page.title: 09Housing in West Farnham
page.content: In the west of this D-block there are a number of isolated farmhouses and cottages. In the east there is a mixture of terraced, semi-detached and detached private housing and council estates such as The Chantrys. {House Prices in June 1985}: {Wrecclesham -}Â£44,950: "Very spacious semi-detached house with 3 bedrooms, large lounge/diner, double garage, excellent decorative order." {Shortheath -}Â£89,950: "A detached quality family house in a quiet position south of Farnham, close to bus routes and local shops. 4 bedrooms, spacious landings, sitting room,dining room, study, fitted kitchen, cloakroom, large entrance hall, double garage." {South Farnham -}Â£42,995:"Much improved character cottage with lounge, kitchen /diner, 2 bedrooms and bathroom."
